## ğŸ“‹ Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with an 'x' -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings or errors
- [ ] I have checked for TypeScript errors (`npm run build`)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] I have tested this on multiple browsers (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested this on multiple blockchains (if applicable)

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated the README (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated the Wiki (if needed)
- [ ] I have updated CHANGELOG.md (if applicable)
- [ ] I have added JSDoc comments to new functions

### Security
- [ ] My changes do not introduce security vulnerabilities
- [ ] I have not exposed any sensitive information (keys, passwords, etc.)
- [ ] I have followed secure coding practices
